snippet.title: Drowning Cross Trailer - a free point and click adventure game
snippet.description:
Here's a quick thingie for my upcoming free point and click adventure game Drowning Cross. I designed it to look like a DOS game from the early 90s with very obvious LucasArts and Sierra inspirations.

It will support Windows, MacOS and Linux. Most likely Android and HTML5, too.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1091960/Drowning_Cross/
itch.io: https://origamihero.itch.io/drowning-cross
Twitter: https://twitter.com/origamihero
